definition: to pay a sum of money/payment
to pay/to hand over to/classifier for pairs or sets of things
section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)
to pay in installments/payment in installments

pinyin: dui4 fang1 fu4 kuan3 dian4 hua4

definition: to defer payment/to pay back over long term
to present (a bill of exchange etc) for payment

sentences.english: Prepay and Post Pay option for each dial plan.
sentences.chinese: 预付款和后付款选项为每个拨号计划。

sentences.english: Prepay and Post Pay option for each dial plan.
sentences.chinese: 预付款和后付款选项为每个拨号计划。

sentences.english: It must not express that the drawee will perform his promise by any other means than the payment of money.
sentences.chinese: 不得书明付款人将用付款以外之方法履行承诺。

sentences.english: It must not express that the drawee will perform his promise by any other means than the payment of money.
sentences.chinese: 不得书明付款人将用付款以外之方法履行承诺。

sentences.english: Payment will be made by irrevocable Letter of Credit against presentation of documents to the issuing bank.
sentences.chinese: 付款方式为凭单据以不可撤消的信用证向发卡行议付。

sentences.english: Can we buy it on instalment?
sentences.chinese: 我们可以用分期付款的方式买吗？

sentences.english: Payment will be per info-graphic image.
sentences.chinese: 付款方式为每个信息，图形图像。

sentences.english: Our terms of payment are cash on delivery.
sentences.chinese: 我们的付款条件是货到付款。

sentences.english: Our terms of payment are cash on delivery.
sentences.chinese: 我们的付款条件是货到付款。

sentences.english: We regret that we are unable to consider your request for payment under D/A terms.
sentences.chinese: 对你方要求以承兑交单方式付款一事，我们谦难考虑。

sentences.english: The private key is used to access the Bitcoins kept in the payor's account.
sentences.chinese: 私钥用于访问比特币付款人的账户。

sentences.english: Payment and pricing can be in IDR or USD or RMB and others currencies.
sentences.chinese: 付款和定价可以是印尼盾或美元或人民币及其他货币。

sentences.english: Or find out that you're six months behind on your mortgage payment?
sentences.chinese: 或者发现你的按揭付款已经超期六个月了？

sentences.english: Payment is valid only after the cheque is cleared.
sentences.chinese: 支票付款须待支票收讫后才生效。

sentences.english: It's 120 yuan . Would you like to pay in cash or bill it to your room?
sentences.chinese: 一共是120元。请问怎样付款，付现金还是入房帐？

definition: to transfer (money to a bank account)
to pay the bill/to settle accounts/also written 結帳|结帐
to use a credit card (or swipe card, smart card etc)
to pay in installments/payment in installments
to place an order/to order/an order (of goods)
